data.name: Seeker
data.description: Discover the five different ways to get the antidote.

data.name: The One Who Rises From Below
data.description: A secret is buried in the sacred grounds of Triad Apex. Find out what lies below.

data.name: Born of Fire
data.description: Mev is... well, let's just say you wouldn't want to get in her way.

tasks.name: Tell her where to find Arvie Graker

data.name: Snake
data.description: Move in the shadows. Disguise yourself. Speak with a forked tongue. Don’t kill unless you have to.

tasks.name: Find a way to pass through the first chapel
Find a way to enter the third chapel
Fool the guard in the Temple Garden that you're a messenger
Convince the prison guards to leave
Convince the prison warden to give you the key
Persuade the smugglers to let you pass
Enter the Sleep Temple by means of invitation
Pass through the dining hall unnoticed

data.name: Deadeye
data.description: Equip the bow. Attack enemies from a distance. Must be done in a single playthrough.

data.name: Bounty Hunter
data.description: Bring 10 Tusk Medallions to Hadrian Trout. You must deliver all of them in a single playthrough in order to complete this achievement.

data.name: Grave Robber
data.description: The dead stay dead. They have no need for material things.

tasks.name: Dig up the grave behind the shack

data.name: Apex Predator
data.description: Kill the most dangerous warriors in the game.

data.name: Remembering the Fallen
data.description: Your friend is dead and gone, but she won't be forgotten.

tasks.name: Tell the nomads about her fate

data.name: Savior
data.description: The world is a wicked place. Killing people is easy. Keeping them alive is easier said than done.

tasks.name: Make peace between the soldiers and the nomads
Make peace between the soldiers and the druids
Bring the renegade druids to safety on Graefir Island
Help the refugees at the gates of the burning city
Tell the priest about the fate of the church worker
Free the lord of Highcastle from captivity

data.name: Antique Dealer
data.description: Bring treasures to the Antiquarian of Emerald Avenue.

data.name: Scholar
data.description: Read all of the scrolls, books and other scriptures.

tasks.name: Poems and Pipe Dreams, Vol. II

data.name: The Last Supper
data.description: Kill the enforcers in the dining hall of the Sleep Temple.

data.name: The End is Just the Beginning
data.description: There's no telling what fate has in store. Unlock seven different endings.
